description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=3/3. Blackjack Strategy King has plenty of help and tips for beginners, and advanced features for experienced players. Features include Basic Strategy, Card Counting, Simulation, Awards, and Cheating. Player can define custom strategies or use the default. Includes options for Bank, Table Limits, Hit Soft 17, Surrender, Number of Decks, and more.
description.short: Blackjack Strategy King has plenty of help and tips for beginners, and advanced features for experienced players. Features include Basic Strategy, Card Counting, Simulation, Awards, and Cheating. Player can define custom strategies or use the default. Includes options for Bank, Table Limits, Hit Soft 17, Surrender, Number of Decks, and more.
